::Halucigen::
Halucigen hopped back quickly calculating that this might have happened.
"I am not lying..I wish to help you in this battle...y would i reapir
your friend if i were against you....i had no idea this was your
base...please belive me" the tiny bot said to the giant one.  Still
his weapons were in a non threatning position.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
>
> He knew this bot was lieing. Hot Rod had been around way to long to fall
> for it. He reached his hand out to shake, but at the last second, it
> turned into the saw. He tryed to chop Halucigen's hand off.
